title: An Interview with Noam Chomsky: Pakistan This Week - Oct 16th 2011 - Part 2 of 2
description:
Pervez Hoodbhoy sits down with Noam Chomsky on Pakistan This Week to discuss the past, present, and future state of global affairs. 
                                        
A LOCAL view for an INTERNATIONAL audience.

Learn about the stories making headlines in Pakistan and get a flavor for sides of Pakistan you don't normally see.
Politics, Culture, Economy, History, Arts... POSITIVITY.. every week highlights the diversity that is Pakistan.

Catch Pakistan This Week, every week, on CNBC Pakistan, CNBC Asia-Pacific, and CNBC World.

Hosted by Ahmar Iqbal with weekly inputs from Islamabad, Karachi, and Lahore Bureaus.

Email Address: ptw@cnbcpakistan.com
